content:
Here are 5 hole in the wall restaurants in San Francisco that have excellent food:

1. El Farolito (Mission District) - This Mexican taqueria serves up some of the best burritos and tacos in the city, with generous portions and deliciously flavorful meats.
2. Golden Boy Pizza (North Beach) - A small, no-frills pizzeria that serves up some of the best square slices in the city, with crispy crusts and flavorful toppings.
3. HRD Coffee Shop (SoMa) - This Korean-American fusion cafe serves up unique and delicious dishes like kimchi burritos, spicy pork tacos, and bulgogi cheesesteaks.
4. Saigon Sandwich (Tenderloin) - A small Vietnamese sandwich shop that serves up delicious, filling banh mi sandwiches with a variety of meat and vegetable options.
5. Brenda's French Soul Food (Tenderloin) - This cozy, Southern-style restaurant serves up delicious and hearty dishes like shrimp and grits, fried chicken, and beignets.
